title: Federal Pirates, Carole Baskin = Hillary? 4.15.20
itunes:title: Federal Pirates, Carole Baskin = Hillary? 4.15.20
description:
In episode 609, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Blair Socci to discuss Florida governor declaring wrestling an essential service, the Feds continuing to steal from states, Trump's PR stunt falling short, Michigan governor shutting it down, interesting takes on Tiger King, Disney trying to make us horny for Robin Hood, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Florida Governor Expands Pandemic Essential Services to Include Professional Wrestling
  2. How a stockpile of 39 million masks was exposed as fake
  3. Trump administration has many task forces — but still no plan for beating covid-19
  4. Trump PR Stunt Falls Flat, as White House Video Exposes His Failure to Prepare for Pandemic
  5. For Some on the Right, No Rumor Is Too Outlandish About Michigan Gov. Gretcher Whitmer
  6. Interesting take on the Tiger King
  7. 'Robin Hood' Remake in the Works at Disney+ With 'Blindspotting' Director (Exclusive)
  8. Disney Announces Live-Action Robin Hood, Ignoring the Lessons of Cats
  9. Disney+ announces live-action Robin Hood reboot that's definitely gonna give kids some thoughts 
  10. Will We Still Be Horny for Robin Hood in Disney’s Upcoming Remake?
  11. HOW FURRIES BECAME A FANDOM
  12. Proof Disney Is Actually Marketing "Zootopia" To Furries
  13. WATCH: Aesop Rock - Drums On The Wheel

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
